original_title: Escape to Nature: Vol. 9: Taking Flight
overview: Accompanies by gentle, relaxing music, dazzling photography of birds in flight will lift you up and let you feel the soothing wind beneath your wings.  This installment of the Escape to Nature series is sure to comfort your overly stressed spirit.  Allow the peaceful beauty of the soaring birds -- amongst the backdrop of stunning natural landscapes -- to aid you in meditation, restore your equilibrium and spark your imagination.
title: Escape to Nature: Vol. 9: Taking Flight
